sentence.Network_en: The shale beds in between generally deform plastically.
sentence.Network_cn: 夹在其中的页岩层通常是塑性变形.

sentence.Network_en: Stresses applied to plastically deform the metal are usually compressive.
sentence.Network_cn: 适用于金属塑性变形的应力通常都是压应力.

sentence.Network_en: All structural materials behave plastically above their elastic range.
sentence.Network_cn: 超过弹性极限时,一切结构材料都显示出塑性.
